abstract: The deal for the Intelligence job placement services unit is the private equity giant’s first major deal in Japan.
snippet: The deal for the Intelligence job placement services unit is the private equity giant’s first major deal in Japan.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said Friday that it had agreed to buy the Intelligence job placement services unit of Usen, a Japanese media company, for 32.5 billion yen, or about $359 million, in the private equity firm’s first major deal in Japan.

headline.main: K.K.R. to Buy Japanese Job Services Business
